sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO payment ( oid , abroad , price , unitsprice , extensionPrice , upgradediffer , vat , shipping_cost , currency , saledate , saletime ) VALUES ( #oid# ,#abroad# ,#price# ,#unitsprice# ,#extensionPrice# ,#upgradediffer# ,#vat# ,#shipping_cost# ,#currency# ,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d') ,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%H%m%s') )
sqlMap.select: SELECT id , oid , abroad , price , unitsprice , extensionPrice , upgradediffer , vat , shipping_cost , currency , saledate , saletime FROM payment WHERE 1 = 1 AND oid = #oid# ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 0, 1
sqlMap.update: UPDATE payment SET abroad = #abroad# , price = #price# , unitsprice = #unitsprice# , extensionPrice = #extensionPrice# , upgradediffer = #upgradediffer# , vat = #vat# , shipping_cost = #shipping_cost# , currency = #currency# WHERE 1 = 1 AND oid = #oid#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM payment WHERE 1 = 1 AND oid = #oid#
